attributes.action: Supply all UK citizens who suffer from Cystic Fibrosis with free medication.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most UK citizens who suffer from life threatening diseases and ailments benefit from free prescriptions for medication to help them fend off the effects of their ailments but working cf sufferers DO NOT. We ask that this disparity of treatment is rectified by HM Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
